languages.text: "Главное, постарайтесь в процессе декапитации не сломать нужную мне штуковину... или человека... или чем бы ни было то, что мы ищем! Не думаю, что нам еще раз так свезет".

traits.locale_text: "Главное постарайтесь в процессе декапитации не сломать нужную мне штуковину... или человека... или чем бы ни было то, что мы ищем! Не думаю, что нам еще раз так свезет".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."
languages.original_text: "Главное, постарайтесь в процессе декапитации не сломать нужную мне штуковину... или человека... или чем бы ни было то, что мы ищем! Не думаю, что нам еще раз так свезет".

traits.locale_text: "Just, while you're busy decapitating, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just, while you're busy decapitating, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “等你忙着砍那个家伙脑袋的时候，请尽量别把我们要找的东西弄碎，也别杀了我们的要找的人！我觉得，这样的机会恐怕不会再有第二次了。”
languages.original_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."

traits.locale_text: “等你忙着砍那个家伙脑袋的时候，请尽量别把我们要找的东西弄碎，也别杀了我们的要找的人！我觉得，这样的机会恐怕不会再有第二次了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Pero intente no romper lo que sea que estemos buscando mientras corta cabezas! No creo que volvamos a tener una oportunidad como esta».
languages.original_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."

traits.locale_text: «¡Pero intente no romper lo que sea que estemos buscando mientras corta cabezas! No creo que volvamos a tener una oportunidad como esta».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Passt nur bitte auf, dass Ihr beim Köpfeabschlagen nicht aus Versehen zerstört, was oder wen wir suchen! So eine Chance bekommen wir wohl nicht wieder."
languages.original_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."

traits.locale_text: "Passt nur bitte auf, dass Ihr beim Köpfeabschlagen nicht aus Versehen zerstört, was oder wen wir suchen! So eine Chance bekommen wir wohl nicht wieder."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「まあ、首を落としまくるのは結構だけど、あたいたちが探しているものはモノでも人でも壊さないようにしてね！こんなチャンスは二度とないと思うから」
languages.original_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、首を落としまくるのは結構だけど、あたいたちが探しているものはモノでも人でも壊さないようにしてね！こんなチャンスは二度とないと思うから」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Faites simplement attention de ne pas endommager la chose ou la personne que nous cherchons pendant que vous faites rouler quelques têtes ! Je doute qu'une autre chance comme celle-ci se représente à nous. »
languages.original_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."

traits.locale_text: « Faites simplement attention de ne pas endommager la chose ou la personne que nous cherchons pendant que vous faites rouler quelques têtes ! Je doute qu'une autre chance comme celle-ci se représente à nous. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Kafa kesmekle meşgulken lütfen aradığımız kişinin arada kaynamadığından emin ol! Bu şansı bir daha zor buluruz."
languages.original_text: "Just, while you're busy lopping off heads, please try not to break whatever or whoever it is we're looking for! I don't think we'll ever get another chance like this."

traits.locale_text: "Kafa kesmekle meşgulken lütfen aradığımız kişinin arada kaynamadığından emin ol! Bu şansı bir daha zor buluruz."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
